title: Create Ad Decisioning Server
name: Create_Ad_Decisioning_Server
description: Creates a new ad decisioning server in the indicated domain by providing an user-defined name and the URL of the server.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account

Request Body Fields.description: A human-readable name for the ad decisioning server
The HTTP request URL of the ad decisioning server

Key-value pair mappings for the ad server URL that can utilize page level parameters passed on the query string(see Parameters section) or Dynamic Ad Parameters (see Dynamic Ad Params section). Double curly bracket syntax in the "key" will not be used and defines a placeholder for the insertion of the key-value pair within the baseUrl. See the example below

examples.title: Create Ad Decisioning Server Request Body Example:

Response Fields.description: The ad decisioning server id
The ad decisioning server name
server
The domain id
map of key/value pairs

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Ad Decisioning Servers
name: Get_Ad_Decisioning_Servers
description: Returns a collection of ad decisioning servers configured for the domainId. This method fetches 20 ad servers per page, returns the totalResult to indicate the total number of ad servers and provides the previous or next page requests within the body.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account

URL Parameters.description: The number of items to return for the request
The set of items (based on pageSize) to return
Filter to applications that have name substring. E.g. name=foo could return applications named "foo", "foobar", "foorific"
Filter to applications that have name substring. E.g. name=foo could return applications named "foo", "foobar", "foorific"
Sort ascending or descending.

Response Fields.description: Array of results
The ad decisioning server id
The ad decisioning server name
server
The domain id
URL to get the previous result set (null if there is none)
URL to get the next result set (null if there is none)
number of results

examples.title: Success Response:

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Add Application Ad Configuration
name: Add_Application_Ad_Configuration
description: Adds or replaces the currently configured adConfigs. The input adConfig can be individual slots "pre-roll", "mid-roll", and/or "post-roll" for direct VAST campaigns OR a single "ad" campaign to indicate the ad decisioning server will determine the ads breaks (e.g. Freewheel SmartXML, DFP ad rules).

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The application id

Request Body Fields.description: The ad slot intended to be updated or replaced. This should only be used with direct VAST campaigns
The name for the ad event
The ad server id
The ad slot intended to be updated or replaced. This should only be used with direct VAST campaigns
The name for the ad event
The ad server id
The ad slot intended to be updated or replaced. This should only be used with direct VAST campaigns
The name for the ad event
The ad server id
Only used for Freewheel SmartXML or DFP ad rules where ad slots are defined by the ad decisioning server. Can not be used with defined preRolls, midRolls, and/or postRolls
An arbitrary name for user readability purposes only
The ad position
The ad server id

The application name
The domain id

title: Create Application
name: Create_Application
description: Creates a new application in the indicated domainId

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account

Request Body Fields.description: The application name

The preRoll ad count. Only used for direct VAST campaigns. Its value will set the number of ads to be returned in the slot. By default this value is set to 0, but is required when using direct VAST tags.

The midRoll ad count. Only used for direct VAST campaigns. Its value will set the number of ads to be returned in each slot. By default this value is set to 0, but is required when using direct VAST tags.

The postRoll ad count. Only used for direct VAST campaigns. Its value will set the number of ads to be returned in the slot. By default this value is set to 0, but is required when using direct VAST tags.

Response Fields.description: The application id
The application name
The domain id
The preRoll ad count
The midRoll ad count
The postRoll ad count

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Application Details

description: Returns the essential information of the application including the ad configurations. The response will include individual ad slots "pre-roll", "mid-roll", and/or "post-roll" for direct VAST configurations and a single "ad" server configurations that have ad break information determined by the ad decisioning server (e.g. Freewheel SmartXML, DFP ad rules). Note that the adConfig returned in the response can be of type single or multi.

The publication rule id
